level.text: CFSA shall maintain the confidentiality of information and records concerning an application for or receipt of a permanent guardianship subsidy. Information or records may only be released as provided by applicable provisions of District or federal law.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 3671 (April 27, 2001) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 10740 (November 23, 2001).
